title: Politiquerias-chickens come home in spanish1931-laurel n hardy

sources.title: Politiquerias-chickens come home in spanish1931-laurel n hardy
sources.description: spanish version of chickens come home with laurel and hardy speaking spanish.ollie is running for mayor.his floosie ex girlfriend will upset his bid for mayor and his marriage if he dosent meet her and pay her off..ollie has to attend a dinner party at his home and cant see his ex..sop she crashes the party..a remake of the 1972 short love em and weep..this film also contains a sequence you'll never see any where else...entertaing at me hardys house is HADJI ALI.. a vaudiville act- you'll see him drink many glasses of water/kerosene/handfulls of hazel nuts ...swallow it all and vomit it all over the place at will-all in the name of wholesome family entertainment...enjoy folks,u may wanna eat lunch BEFORE watching this film
